author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ... KIKO IS PRODUCING LIFE-THREATENING RIP CURRENTS AND HIGH SURF ACROSS PORTIONS OF HAWAIIAN ISLANDS...
summary: ... KIKO IS PRODUCING LIFE-THREATENING RIP CURRENTS AND HIGH SURF ACROSS PORTIONS OF HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... As of 11:00 AM HST Tue Sep 09 the center of Kiko was located near 22.9, -154.9 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Kiko (CP4/EP112025)
